text: Motion
(All three seem to be focused on what they're doing.)

...Mano, that was great!
Your singing voice is so gorgeous!

Howa, i-is that so...?
I can't really tell myself...

I think it was beautiful too. That voice is your charm,
so you should be aware of it and develop it.

Hiori-chan too...
Umm, thank you...!

(──Yeah, it was a beautiful voice, and it fits
Mano's warm atmosphere perfectly.)
Well, then, let's move on to the dance lesson.

(Meguru's physical ability is indeed impressive, and the fact
that she dances like she's having a good time is nice too)

Howa...
Meguru-chan, you're so cool...
...Right. I guess it's like this!

Good job.
Hachimiya-san's dance was very sharp.

Really!? Thank you!
I guess it's because you've been helping out a lot, huh?

I don't know about that. But...
now let's try to combine singing and dancing.

(Hiori has a nice balance between singing and
dancing, neither of which is easy feat to pull off.)

No good...!
I can't get it to work no matter how many times I try!

Howa... I'm sorry...
I didn't get it right...

...It's okay. besides, you'll have to practice a
lot until you get used to it.

I see, I get it! This is a lesson after all!
Mano, let's work together to catch up!
...Yeah...

(Each one has a different brilliance - ...
I look forward to seeing what the future holds.)
